com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Message
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Message - encapsulates a simple message that is to be displayed to the user.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_MESSAGE
      A message type that indicates that a message is an "error message".

      A message type that indicates that a message is a "warning message".
